New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored a half-century at a strike rate of almost 190
Key Match Events: India won the match by 47 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took 3/7 to stunt Afghanistan's chance of closing in on the target
Rashid Khan took 3/26 from four overs
Pre-Game Insights: India's middle order got much-needed time to settle into the tournament
Suryakumar Yadav mentioned that he enjoys batting in the phase between overs 7 to 15
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya expressed that India's middle-order have now had the chance to get time out in the middle and will hope to kick on to bigger scores down the line
Rashid Khan was outstanding and helped tie India down
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Barbados
India's bowlers did a fine job to completely control the chase
